item.description:
Peer-reviewed Journals
  1. Theran, Louis, Anthony Nixon, Elissa Ross, Mahdi Sadjadi, Brigitte Servatius, and Michael F. Thorpe. «Anchored boundary conditions for locally isostatic networks.» Physical Review E 92, no. 5 (2015): 053306. (arXiv:1508.00666)

item.title: research

item.title: about
item.author: sadjadi.seyedmahdi AT gmail DOT com (Mahdi Sadjadi)
item.description:
Hello! I am Mahdi Sadjadi, a physics PhD student at Arizona State University. I work under Mike Thorpe. My research is primarily on amorphous materials and rigidity theory.

I also enjoy working on data and coding in Python.
